Description: Square limestone stela of Manna; panel of Coptic text above four doves; square attachment-hole.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.139-140)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I App:2 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
